mapper.update: update design set projects_id = #{projectsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, designer_id = #{designerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, filepath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, design_time = #{designTime,jdbcType=DATE}, plan_start_time = #{planStartTime,jdbcType=DATE}, plan_end_time = #{planEndTime,jdbcType=DATE}, note_taker = #{noteTaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, projects_id, designer_id, filepath, design_time, plan_start_time, plan_end_time, note_taker, record_time from design where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, projects_id, designer_id, filepath, design_time, plan_start_time, plan_end_time, note_taker, record_time from design
